Title: Memories of Sindragosa and Malygos
Description:
I admit, I forgot about this phenomenon. Blue dragons who meet violent ends occasionally have some lingering arcane energy.

That energy may manifest in various ways once their essences are laid to rest. 

Luckily, it is a simple enough process to dispel them. Simply wave anything through the energy and it will dissipate. 

I shall investigate the essences of Sindragosa and Malygos within this gravestone while you handle that.
ObjectivesText: Dispel the lingering memories of Sindragosa and Malygos.

Objectives.Text: Memory of a Traitorous Sister dispelled
